eu.name: European Union
eu.description: EU/EFTA member states with EU Data Boundary requirements

key_regulations.name: GDPR
key_regulations.description: EU-wide data protection and privacy regulation
requirements: Data must be processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently
Personal data cannot be transferred outside EU without adequate protections
Data subjects have rights to access, rectify, and erase their data
Data Protection Impact Assessments required for high-risk processing
key_regulations.why_on_premises: On-premises deployment ensures personal data never leaves your jurisdiction, eliminating cross-border transfer concerns under Schrems II

key_regulations.name: EU Data Boundary
key_regulations.description: Microsoft commitment to store and process EU data within EU/EFTA
requirements: Customer data stored and processed only in EU/EFTA datacenters
Applies to Azure, M365, Dynamics 365, Power Platform
Pseudonymized personal data remains in boundary
key_regulations.why_on_premises: Azure Local provides even stronger guarantees - data never leaves your physical premises

eu.data_residency_note: EU Data Boundary ensures data stays within EU/EFTA. Azure Local goes further - data stays in YOUR datacenter.

germany.name: Germany

key_regulations.name: BDSG
key_regulations.description: German implementation of GDPR with additional requirements
requirements: Stricter requirements for employee data processing
Additional safeguards for profiling and automated decisions
Mandatory Data Protection Officer for certain organizations
key_regulations.why_on_premises: German regulators are particularly strict on cloud data - on-premises eliminates regulatory uncertainty

key_regulations.name: C5
key_regulations.description: BSI cloud security standard required for German public sector
requirements: Transparency about data location and subcontractors
key_regulations.why_on_premises: Azure Local simplifies C5 compliance - you control the entire stack

germany.data_residency_note: German federal agencies often require data to remain on German soil. Azure Local meets this requirement.

france.name: France

key_regulations.name: SecNumCloud
key_regulations.description: ANSSI certification for highly secure cloud services
requirements: Data must be hosted in France/EU
